name: Alex Ramirez
persona: Alex Ramirez is a 20-year-old Computer Science major currently struggling academically, with a CGPA of 1.23. He often finds it difficult to stay organized and motivated, which impacts his ability to keep up with coursework. Although Alex doesn't experience much test anxiety, he tends to put in minimal effort and has low confidence in his academic abilities. He recognizes the need for change and is considering seeking support to help improve his study habits and performance.
